title: Cyprus Hotel Site Snapshot Input
description: Collect raw HTML and mobile screenshots (home page) for a single hotel website.

hotelId.title: Hotel ID
hotelId.description: MongoDB hotels._id as string. Used to join snapshot with your database.

seedUrls.title: Seed URLs
seedUrls.description: Optional list of starting URLs. If empty, https://<domain>/ will be used.

maxPages.title: Max pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of pages to crawl (including seed).

maxDepth.title: Max depth
maxDepth.description: Maximum crawl depth from seed URLs (0 = only seed).

maxRequestsPerMinute.title: Max requests per minute
maxRequestsPerMinute.description: Max requests per minute to keep load reasonable.

maxRequestRetries.title: Max request retries
maxRequestRetries.description: Maximum number of retries per request (Crawlee). Use 0-1 to fail fast on dead/slow sites and reduce cost.

navigationTimeoutMs.title: Navigation timeout (ms)
navigationTimeoutMs.description: Navigation timeout in milliseconds for page loads.

requestTimeoutMs.title: Request handler timeout (ms)
requestTimeoutMs.description: Request handler timeout in milliseconds for each request (Crawlee requestHandlerTimeoutSecs).

storeHtml.title: Store HTML
storeHtml.description: Whether to store raw HTML for crawled pages (not only home).

storeHeaders.title: Store headers
storeHeaders.description: Whether to store response headers for crawled pages.

takeHomeMobileScreenshot.title: Take home mobile screenshot
takeHomeMobileScreenshot.description: Whether to store a mobile screenshot of the homepage.

tryDismissConsent.title: Try dismiss consent
tryDismissConsent.description: If true, tries to click common cookie/consent banners on homepage.

homeMobileViewport.title: Home mobile viewport
homeMobileViewport.description: If provided, overrides default mobile viewport settings.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Optional tags to add into output for debugging/segmentation.

debug.title: Debug
debug.description: If true, prints more detailed logs.
